summary: A fix for the 3 person seater Stone Bench found in Dwemer ruins and Markath
descriptionHtml:
Instructions: Simply unpack the file in your Skyrim/Data folder.

Some time ago I found out that the Stone Bench only had 1 seat despite being big enough to sit 3 persons. Unlike other benches that let you sit on the nearest spot when you activate it the Stone Bench would only let you sit on 1 spot, no matter what.

At first I thought it was my fault, maybe some mod I downloaded messed it. But I found no compatibility problems, it was as if the bench was bugged from the base game.

After poking a bit I found the way to fix it, and here it is!
author: Kanaru
